titles.title: Deficit Accountability Act of 1993
To amend title 2, United States Code, to provide that an increase in the rate of pay for Members of Congress may not go into effect following a budget deficit in the preceding fiscal year.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

bill.summary: 1/5/1993--Introduced. Deficit Accountability Act of 1993 - Amends Federal law to prohibit an increase in the salary of a Member of Congress from going into effect if the Director of the Office of Management and Budget has determined that there was a deficit for the preceding fiscal year.
